Description: Rectangular wooden shabti-coffin with an arched lid with ridges at either end(one damaged); column of Hieroglyphic text on the lid and rows on the long sides; inside is a wooden stick shabti and the remains of textile.
Condition: fair - damage to the top ridge
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
Additional IDs: Other BM number: EA37619 (original Big Number of shabti)
